meanings.definition: A type of optical disc storage medium that was used for home video playback.
meanings.sent1: My dad showed me his old laserdisc collection.
meanings.sent2: The laserdisc contained a classic movie from the 80s.
meanings.sent3: I tried using a laserdisc as a coaster, but it didn't work well.
meanings.sent4: The laserdisc gleamed like a tiny mirror in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The laserdisc looked like a shiny Frisbee.

meanings.definition: To play or watch something on a laserdisc player.
meanings.sent1: We decided to laserdisc our favorite movie for movie night.
meanings.sent2: She laserdiscs old concerts to enjoy the nostalgia.
meanings.sent3: I laserdisc my cat chasing the laser pointer on the screen.
meanings.sent4: He laserdiscs the film onto the blank disc carefully.
meanings.sent5: They laserdisc the documentary to study the details closely.
